subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: Jaipur is the capital of Rajasthan.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jaisalmer?
question_hi: जयपुर किसे संगोलकर रोट किसे सबनी मैंड की जानकारी है।

options.explanation_en: The famous Jaisalmer Fort is located in Jaisalmer, Rajasthan.
options.explanation_hi: जयपुर संगोलकर रोट क्रुर संगोलकर रोट की जानकारी है।

options.explanation_en: Mehrangarh Fort is located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan.
options.explanation_hi: मेरंगरखा संगोलकर रोट की जानकारी है।

options.explanation_en: Amer Fort is located near Jaipur, Rajasthan.
Hawa Mahal is a historic palace in Jaipur, Rajasthan.
Chittorgarh Fort is a historical fort in Chittor district, Rajasthan.
options.explanation_hi: चीटोरगार फोट कितोर ड्यान जानकारी है।

options.explanation_en: Samode Haveli is a palace located in Samode village, near Jaipur, Rajasthan.
options.explanation_hi: सामोद हावेल विभिला या जानकारी है।

options.explanation_en: Amber Fort, also known as Amer Fort, is a historic fort located near Jaipur, Rajasthan.
Ranthambore Fort is a wildlife sanctuary and not a fort.
Udaipur is a city in Rajasthan.,
Jaisalmer is a city in Rajasthan.
